name: HeliQWOPter
description:
NOTE: Leap Motion hardware required!

Use your mad flight skills to rescue survivors before the impending blizzard wipes them out!

Left Hand - Tilt to stear / accelerate, Move up/down to adjust height

Right Hand - Grab survivors with ropes and drop them off at helipads in the area

Watch your fuel! It can be refilled when flying close to helipads.

Hint: Helipads can be found in the woods.
